stories.title: Senate bill to guarantee freedom to travel across states for abortions blocked

stories.text:
I know, this is a crazy ask.

I'm looking for help from privacy / data experts to figure out the best way to architect our Period Tracking App. Ever since Roe vs. Wade was overturned, millions of women have been deleting their period tracking apps because the information can be used to prosecute (https://abcnews.go.com/Health/abortion-advocates-fear-period-tracking-apps-prosecute-abortion/story?id=85925714).

We're working on a project called shameless.app. If anyone has any thoughts on the best ways to architect this so the government can't get their hands on this data, please let me know.
stories.title: Best Encryption Method? Prevent Government from Taking Data Post Roe vs. Wade
